item.title: Papers in preparation
item.description: A comprehensive benchmark for optical remote sensing image super-resolution Submitted to IEEE Geoscience and Remote Sensing Letters Development of a realistic HR degradation model for synthetic Sentinel-2 image generation In preparation Sentinel-2 HR image super-resolution with latent diffusion models In preparation Project Deliverables Requirements Baseline (RB) v1 – 2022-09 SR and xAI methodology Report (SRR) v1 – 2023-06 Media Package (MP) v1 – 2023-07
